channel.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
channel.description:
I'm sick of seeing this gay threads stating: TO MAKE HOMEWORK FUN, LETS DO IT LIME GREEN PAPER!!! BUT MAKE SURE TO ASK YOUR TEACHER FIRST!!! CUZ THEN YOU MIGHT GET IN TROUBLE!!! OMG WE DON'T WANT THAT.
They are obviously huge gay-pussies and can't even spell the word 'cause' right nor type.
How do we get rid of them?
When you register, it should say
"We are friends with C.O.I.S (Children on the Internet Safety) and we will report if you 'fake' your age online. That is considered fraud and you could go to jail for that."
Some fake statement to piss their pants.

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @jimmy5410 jimmy5410
item.description:
@jimmy5410 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny”][quote author=Moparisthebest]
It’s not so much an age problem as a maturity problem, there are quite a few 13 year olds on here that are far more mature than some of the 18 year olds.
[/quote]
STOP REFERRING TO TICO AND ME.[/quote]
Ahahaha

Read full topic
item.source: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:42, topic:270188”]Wrauld: Do you remember anything about how you did the quiz?

The quiz works fine. The people aren’t working. The same person who made this thread - look at his last 10 or so posts. Hypocrisy, rife it is.

His posts have enough WIN for my liking, a bit crude though his methods may be (Surely the years will see his improvement etc)[/quote]
Yes, I do. I tended to follow the ‘theme’ of the forum though after I took the test.

Read full topic

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

What you could do is add some sort of timer, that prevents you from doing the quiz a third time for a while. So if someone makes the same mistakes twice, which points to guessing, he can’t do the test for half an hour. Those who don’t care about this forums will walk away.

The problem with that, is then nothing stops them from simply creating another account and trying again.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Google can provide the answers but I think replacing the multiple choice questions with non-case sensitive written answers could prevent 10 year olds guessing the answers or using trial and error.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:24, topic:270188”][quote author=Archer link=topic=356602.msg2728982#msg2728982 date=1238557757]

The quiz is 10 questions drawn from a pool of 21 or so randomly and placed in a random order, so it should be hard for people to post answers. I can’t find any on the site you linked to.

Yea, I think the current quiz is enough.
[/quote]

Obviously it isn’t.[/quote]

The quiz wasn’t intended to test intelligence, it was intended to test independent work ethics. Basically, it was created so that people do use google to look up answers to their questions. This eliminates all excuses for those who can’t find their answer on the forum, see?

Read full topic
item.source: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

bowserjr2:

How did they take the quiz then?

That is a good question. We ought to find out: Someone from here who knows what they’re doing should get someone who doesn’t to try and join the site; and monitor how they manage the quiz. Or something like that - people who evidently should be failing aren’t, and we should know why.

(Possibly they are finding answers from places like this.)

Read full topic
item.source: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?

item.title: Can we please keep the 10 years out of mitb?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Niall:

[quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=356602.msg2728241#msg2728241 date=1238524030]Most of them come from moparscape

Which is why this idea won’t work BECAUSE THEY DON’T READ ANYTHING THAT IS EVEN CONSIDERED A PARAGRAPH![/quote]
How did they take the quiz then?

But someone should make a new and better, where you have to think and not just guess the answer or google it.
Some sort of IQ test would be good, you have to get over 100 in IQ or you get banned.

Read full topic
